title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label.

OB: The label height remains the same even after changing the font size.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly to accommodate the new font size.
SR: 
1. Create a label.
2. Set the initial font size of the label.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the label height does not change as expected.
